titleStmt.title: Three letters of publick concernment as to the present affairs ... as also concerning the late publication of the covenant in all churches / by a person of quality and of a publick spirit.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: print show-through, with loss of print.
Reproduction of the original in the Huntington Library.

(from t.p.) I. To a friend in London -- II. To the Lord General Monck, in behalf of monarchy and episcopacy -- III. Concerning the just placing of the legislative power and its influence upon ecclesiasticall laws and persons.

person.persName: Person of quality and of a publick spirit.
